channel.title: Change Wilderness Level

item.title: Change Wilderness Level
item.dc:creator: @redbloodelf2 redbloodelf2
item.description:
@redbloodelf2 wrote:

Okay, i want to make my Bounty Hunter area a higher bounty level when its located in level 11-13 in wildy. I donâ€™t know where to change it.

if (isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1)) { if (!hasWildySign) { hasWildySign = true; outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("", 199); } int level = ((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1; if (level != wildyLevel) { wildyLevel = level; sendQuest("Level: " + wildyLevel, 199); } }

I looked in search and this is what i found, dunno if its needed because all i see is one cord.

Read full topic
